name: Number Harvest
description:
Harvest the numbers (in order from least/bluest to greatest/reddest if you can) by touching them with the line segment. Move the two endpoints of the line segment around using WASD and IJKL.

Finding the game too easy? Challenge yourself to never stop moving: always keep at least one of W, A, S, D, I, J, K, or L held down at a time.

The two sound files used in this game (which will not necessarily play every time a number is harvested) were released into the public domain by pan14 on freesound.org.
